item.title: EU Official: Discussion on Tariff Exemption for Wine and Spirits in EU-US Trade Agreement is Still Ongoing
item.description: July 28: EU officials indicated that the discussions on tariff exemptions for wine and spirits are still in progress within the EU-US trade agreement. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: In July, CEX Stablecoin Outflow Surged to $5.7 Billion
item.description: On July 28th, according to Sentora, in July, the net outflows of stablecoins from exchanges witnessed a significant surge to the highest level in nearly two years, with a total of over $5.7 billion being withdrawn.

item.title: Binance Launches RWUSD, Bringing Tokenized Representation of RWA Assets such as US Treasury Bonds
item.description: On July 28th, Binance Earn launched RWUSD - a principal-guaranteed yield product aimed at tracking the yield performance of real-world assets (RWA) like tokenized U.S. Treasury bonds. Currently, users are able to earn an annualized yield (APR) of up to 4.2% while holding RWUSD.Users can subscribe to RWUSD by using eligible stablecoins (such as USDT or USDC), provided that they meet the eligibility requirements in their region. After subscribing, users will obtain an equivalent amount of RWUSD in their spot account at a 1:1 ratio, and Binance does not charge any subscription fees.When redeeming, RWUSD can be redeemed for USDC at a 1:1 ratio, regardless of the stablecoin initially used for subscription. Users have the option to choose between "Fast Redemption" and "Standard Redemption", and corresponding fees will be applicable upon redemption.

item.title: Analyst: The Fed May Restart Rate Cuts in September
item.description: On July 28th. Analysts from Bank Pictet stated in a report that the Federal Reserve might resume its rate-cutting cycle during the September FOMC meeting. They pointed out that the weakening economic prospects suggest that the Fed will adopt looser monetary policy in the second half of the year. They further added that the uncertainty regarding inflation following the tariff increase, along with the political pressure from President Trump to cut rates, have prevented a rate cut this month.They declared that after July, the stagnant private consumption and the reduced investment plans (indicating softening demand) will demonstrate that despite inflation being above the target, it is justified to ease the restrictive policy stance. (FXStreet)

item.title: RWA Project Asteroid X's Official Twitter Account Hacked, Hacker Has Posted a Scam Link
item.description: On July 28th, the official Twitter account of Asteroid X, which has the goal of tokenizing high-quality mining exploration assets in Australia, was hacked. The hacker has posted a scam link.BlockBeats wants to remind users: Do not interact with this account. Please be careful and protect your assets.

item.title: Hotcoin Brand Fully Upgraded, Unveiling a Refreshed Trading Experience
item.description: On July 28th, Hotcoin officially launched a brand new look. Six major modules have been upgraded to enhance the overall user experience:· UI Visual Optimization: The interface texture has been fully upgraded, making operations more intuitive and smooth, bringing a brand new visual feast.· Strengthened Live Streaming Function: The playback function has been added, so you will never miss any market analysis. Key content can be reviewed at any time.· Matching Engine Upgrade: Performance has been greatly improved, and trading matching is more efficient, helping you quickly seize trading opportunities.· Market Tools Upgrade: The second-level candlestick chart has been added, which can capture more sensitive data and enable more timely market trend analysis.· Hot Selection Expansion: In-depth research reports and weekly insights have been added, providing more accurate trading references and making decisions more confidently.· Renewed Welfare Center: More exclusive benefits have been l

item.title: Suspected HashKey Capital Address Deposits 12,000 ETH into OKX, Equivalent to approximately $47.18 million
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by EmberCN, an institutional address (suspected to be HashKey Capital) transferred 12,000 ETH (approximately $47.18 million) to OKX half an hour ago.

item.title: Fan Token Sector Surges, ATM Surpasses 80% Growth in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 28th, according to HTX market data, the fan token sector witnessed a general upward trend, including:· ATM rose by more than 80% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $2.07;· ASR increased by more than 37% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $5.32;· ACM surged by more than 22% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.06;· JUV went up by more than 20% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.18;· CITY rose by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.06;· BAR surged by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.29;· PSG increased by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.86;· SANTOS rose by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $2.61.

item.title: Tether Issues 1 Billion USDT on the Tron Network
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by Whale Alert, Tether minted 1 billion USDT on the Tron network 20 minutes ago. Since the beginning of July this year, Tether has minted a cumulative total of 8 billion USDT.

item.title: Last week, digital asset investment products recorded a net inflow of $1.9 billion, with Ethereum seeing an inflow of $1.59 billion.
item.description: On July 28th, according to the latest weekly report from CoinShares, last week witnessed a $1.9 billion inflow into digital asset investment products, maintaining a positive trend for 15 consecutive weeks. This has led to the total inflows for the month reaching a record-breaking $11.2 billion, far exceeding the $7.6 billion in December 2024 following the US election. Fund flows differed by region. The United States and Germany saw significant inflows of $2 billion and $70 million respectively, while offsetting outflows from Brazil ($23.2 million), Canada ($84.3 million), and Hong Kong ($160 million).Ethereum demonstrated outstanding performance and led exceptionally last week with an inflow of $1.59 billion, marking it as the second-highest single-week inflow on record. Year-to-date, Ethereum has seen total inflows of $7.79 billion, surpassing the inflow total for the entire previous year.In contrast, Bitcoin saw a relatively small outflow of $175 million in total, showing a signi
